name: My Financial Career
summary: An animated film based on Stephen Leacock's witty account of a young man's first brush with banking. When he tries to make his deposit, he is so intimidated by the institution that nothing he says comes out right.
info:
• 别名: Ma carrière financière
  • 上映年度: 1962
  • 类型: 动画 / 短片 / 家庭
  • 制片国家/地区: 加拿大
  • 语言: 英语
  • 导演: Stephen Leacock
